name: FonGenie
tag_list: business-intelligence, analytics, b2b, small-business, crm, communications, saas, real-time
overview:
FonGenie allows small businesses and retailers to turbo charge sales in real-time.

The company’s services offering puts a sharp focus on developing a creative, user-friendly service that will help small businesses and retailers unleash new levels of efficiencies to increase revenue, reduce costs and grow the business while boosting profits.
